str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and eimi; to be near, i.e. At hand; neuter present participle time being, or property.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To report (from one place to another), bring a report, announce, declare. From apo and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A Galilean, an inhabitant of Galilee. From Galilaia; Galilean or belonging to Galilea.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural

str2: Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
Pilate. Of Latin origin; close-pressed, i.e. Firm; Pilatus, a Roman.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To mix, mingle. A primary verb; to mix.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering. From thuo; sacrifice.
